titleStmt.title: Order of Their Excellencies the lords justices in council, confirming several acts and laws of the province of the Massachusetts-Bay made in the years 1694, 1695, 1696, 1697 at the council chamber at Whitehall, the 24 of November, 1698 : present, Their Excellencies the lords justices ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bartholomew Green and John Allen ...,

notesStmt.note: "Order of Their Excellencies the lords justices in council, repealing several acts of the province of Massachusetts-Bay, made in the years, 1695, 1696 & 1697"--P. 3-4.
Imperfect: pages stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
